markdownRemark.html:
About this project

This website was created to serve as a portfolio for myself as a software developer. I worked on it for 3 months before its release. Since I want to brand myself as a "Software Developer specializing in Modern JavaScript", I had to create a new portfolio to fit the part. The website is fully built in GatsbyJS which uses ReactJS and GraphQL to provide a very fast website viewing experience.

Technical Sheet

  • UI/UX Architecture
  • UI/UX Animations
  • React
  • Redux
  • Webpack
  • Atom
  • Javascript ES6
  • HTML5 - semantic, video, canvas

Resources

  • Download the app at HTTPS://GOOGLE.COM
